009package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder;
020import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder.Parameters;
021import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder.RegionType;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the {@link NiblackThresholder} class.
026 * See Sec. 9.2.2 of [1] for additional details.
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2022/04/01
030 * @see imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder
031 */
032public class Adaptive_Niblack implements PlugInFilter {
033        
034//      enum RegionType { Box, Disk, Gaussian }
035        
036        private static RegionType regType = RegionType.Box;
037        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
038
039        @Override
040        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
041                return DOES_8G;
042        }
043
044        @Override
045        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
046                if (!runDialog(params))
047                        return;
048                
049                ByteProcessor I = (ByteProcessor) ip;
050                NiblackThresholder thr = NiblackThresholder.create(regType, params);
051                ByteProcessor Q = thr.getThreshold(I);
052                thr.threshold(I, Q);
053        }
054        
055        boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
056                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
057                gd.addEnumChoice("Region type", regType);
058                addToDialog(params, gd);
059                
060                gd.showDialog();
061                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
062                        return false;
063                }
064                
065                regType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(RegionType.class);
066                getFromDialog(params, gd);
067                return true;
068        }
069}
